email_text.subject: Book for Review: Due Date Reminder
email_text.body:
Dear {$authorName}:
This is a friendly reminder that your book review of {$bookForReviewTitle} is due {$bookForReviewDueDate}.
To submit your book review, please log into the journal website and complete the online article submission process. For your convenience, a submission URL has been provided below.
Submission URL: {$submissionUrl}
Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions or concerns about this book review.
Thank you for your contribution to the journal and I look forward to receiving your submission.
{$editorialContactSignature}
email_text.description: This is an automatically generated email that is sent to a book for review author as a reminder that the due date for the review is approaching.

email_text.subject: Book for Review: Review Due
email_text.body:
Dear {$authorName}:
This is a friendly reminder that your book review of {$bookForReviewTitle} was due {$bookForReviewDueDate} but has not been received yet.
To submit your book review, please log into the journal website and complete the online article submission process. For your convenience, a submission URL has been provided below.
Submission URL: {$submissionUrl}
Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions or concerns about this book review.
Thank you for your contribution to the journal and I look forward to receiving your submission.
{$editorialContactSignature}
email_text.description: This is an automatically generated email that is sent to a book for review author after the review due date has passed.

email_text.subject: Book for Review: Book Assigned
email_text.description: This email is sent by an editor to a book review author when an editor assigns the book for review to the author.

email_text.subject: Book for Review
email_text.body:
Dear {$authorName}:
Unfortunately, I am not able to assign {$bookForReviewTitle} to you at this time for a book review.
I hope you consider reviewing another book from our listing, either at this time or in the future.
{$editorialContactSignature}
email_text.description: This email is sent by an editor to an interested author when a book is no longer available for review.

email_text.subject: Book for Review: Book Requested
email_text.body:
Dear {$editorName}:
I am interested in writing a book review of {$bookForReviewTitle}.
Can you please confirm whether this book is still available for review?
{$authorContactSignature}
email_text.description: This email is sent to an editor by an author interested in writing a book review for a listed book.

email_text.subject: Book for Review: Book Mailed
email_text.description: This email is sent by an editor to a book review author when the editor has mailed a copy of the book to the author.

email_text.subject: Değerlendirme İçin Kitap
email_text.body:
Dear {$authorName}:
This email confirms that you have been removed as the book reviewer for {$bookForReviewTitle}, which will be made available to other authors interested in reviewing the book.
I hope you consider reviewing another book from our listing, either at this time or in the future.
{$editorialContactSignature}
email_text.description: This email is sent by an editor to an interested author when a book is no longer available for review.
